title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.3 - Authority to adopt state plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 600.3 - Authority to adopt state plan

State Regulations

The authority for the implementation and adoption of this

Part affecting the registration of apprenticeship programs with the State of

New York is vested in the commissioner, under authority of section
811
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
600.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
